name: piwigo-bootstrap-darkroom
description: A Piwigo theme based on Bootstrap 4
author: Thomas Kuther

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-darkroom.scss css/bootstrap-darkroom/bootstrap.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/theme.scss theme.css
scripts.build-material: for i in amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal; do node-sass --importer=node_modules/node-sass-tilde-importer --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/material/_${i}.scss css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css && postcss --config components/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/material-${i}/bootstrap.min.css css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css; done
scripts.build-material:js: pushd node_modules/bootstrap-material-design; npm install && npm run build:js; popd; cp node_modules/bootstrap-material-design/dist/js/bootstrap-material-design.min.js js/
scripts.build-bootswatch: for i in cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal materia minty litera lumen lux pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti; do node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootswatch/_${i}.scss css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css && postcss --config components/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.min.css css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css; done
